pages.text: The earth element stone is a powerful stone that can cause an earthquake where there has never been one. The character of earth masters is reflected by resistance and steadfastness.

pages.title: Abilities
pages.text: Earth Block Attack - allows you to use earth blocks to attack (if you have blocks of stone and deep slate in your inventory, can be throw it. The damage is higher when doing so).$(br)Stalagmite Piercing - pierces the nearest target with a stalagmite, dealing critical damage to the enemy.$(br)Earthquakes - deals damage to enemies within a radius, causing a shaking effect on attack targets.$(br)Weapon: Earth hammer$(br)Passive ability: None
